data.name: Behold The Dark
data.detailed_description:
The Sun no longer shines, and now there’s an apocalypse. Darkness becomes the new dawn as it consumes the world and its people. Those who remain cling onto a fading, flickering torch and those who don’t were either devoured by blackened creatures or slaughtered by desperate survivors. You are a survivor, and you must do whatever it takes to keep your torch aflame because your torch is the only thing capable of fending off that horrible oblivion. Your torch is your one and only hope of finding a way to escape this madness.

Features:

An open world set in a dark wasteland
Lighting mechanics that influence survival and exploration
Blackened monsters that attack from the shadows
Interactions and conversations with other survivors
Fluid combat to fight against people and creatures
Items and inventory management
Full game, 2-3 hours gameplay, with a method of escaping the apocalypse
You can pet the dog

data.short_description: Behold The Dark is a 2D isometric action, adventure game with pixel graphics and survival horror elements emphasizing on lighting mechanics. Fight off monsters, interact with people, stay in the light, do whatever it takes to fend off that horrible oblivion.
